EmailTemplate.description: Template for email confirmation to partner
EmailTemplate.name: Deal Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Deal Registered - Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.CreatedBy},
The lead dated {!Lead.CreatedDate} for {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} owner of {!Lead.Company} has been submitted to our Sales Department for review. If we require any additional information, we will notify you immediately.
If you have any questions, please call our Sales Assistant department at 240-514-2000.
Thank you for your business! RapidAdvance Staff
